title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, October 16, 2021
description: "An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all." -- Oscar Wilde, born on this day in 1854.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all." -- Oscar Wilde, born on this day in 1854.
